tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserLocation (
    location_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
);
CREATE TABLE user_login_activity (     user_id INT,     username TEXT,     login_timestamp TIMESTAMP,     login_ip VARCHAR(15),     login_success BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE login_attempts (     attempt_id INT,     user_id INT,     attempt_timestamp TIMESTAMP,     attempt_ip VARCHAR(15),     attempt_success BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE login_failures (     failure_id INT,     user_id INT,     failure_timestamp TIMESTAMP,     failure_ip VARCHAR(15) );
CREATE TABLE login_history (     history_id INT,     user_id INT,     action TEXT,     timestamp TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE login_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    login_time TIMESTAMP,
    logout_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE login_attempts (
    attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    attempt_time TIMESTAMP,
    success BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE device_info (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_login TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
